entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.npc_1_1: An industrial spy has decided that the best way to help his company is by becoming a murderer and killing our top executives.  I want this guy eliminated, and I don't care to know the details.  Up for this?
entries.npc_2_1: Thank you...I'll be waiting anxiously for your return.
entries.npc_3_1: Surely somebody will be able to help me.  Thanks for nothing, though.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go.  It needs some ink, but you'll never have one better.
entries.player_1_1: I'll be back before you know it.
entries.npc_1_2: There's a madman claiming to be a business executive killing young Twilek women on this planet.  I know where he is, but the police won't listen to me.  I'll pay you myself if you'll take care of this.
entries.npc_3_2: That's too bad.  I'll find somebody useful.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  See I had good seats, and I didn't let them tear it.  You should be able to get something for it if you want.
entries.player_1_2: I'll take care of it.  Someone has to.
entries.npc_4_1: I can't discuss it for legal reasons.
entries.npc_4_2: I'm not sure.  Maybe he was jilted by one.  Or maybe he's just crazy.  Does the why really matter at this point?
